traits.Spider Climb: The horror can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
traits.Sunlight Sensitivity: While in sunlight, the horror has disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.Multiattack: The horror can use its Maddening Presence and make three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +11+1d10 + 6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) piercing damage.
actions.Claws: Melee Weapon Attack: +11+1d10 + 6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 24 (4d8 + 6) slashing damage.
actions.Maddening Presence: The horror targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the horror, the target must make a DC 17+1d10 + 12 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the target becomes paralyzed until the end of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the horror's Maddening Presence for the next 24 hours.
